def_en: If someone preens themselves, they spend a lot of time making themselves look neat and attractive; used especially if you want to show that you disapprove of this behaviour or that you find it ridiculous and amusing.

def_cn: 得意洋洋；沾沾自喜；感觉良好
def_en: If someone preens, they think in a pleased way about how attractive, clever, or good at something they are.
When birds preen their feathers, they clean them and arrange them neatly using their beaks.
